name: Nobo Finance
description: Nobo Finance is a powerful community-driven project/platform that aims to bring tremendous advancements to the cryptocurrency market. The ultimate goal is to establish itself as a reliable project and a household name in the Crypto Stratosphere. Our enduring wish is to provide our investors with a consistent and high price flow. We will create a secure DEX that will allow users to do the following: - Bridge Binance Smart Chain and Ethereum in a simple and cost-effective manner.- - Trade cryptocurrency tokens with affordable fees NoboSwap, our decentralized exchange, will launch in mid January 2022 to provide full service trading, staking, pooling, and an ICO launch capability. We will also develop NOBOF CEX to: - Trade all cryptocurrencies - Allow users to easily convert crypto to Fiat, send and receive fiat. With a total supply of 300 trillion tokens, built on the Binance Smart Chain, NOBF will provide real use cases for holders.
